text: Raquel Lyra (born 2 December 1978) is the current mayor of Caruaru, and in the past served in the state legislature from 2011 to 2017. ==Personal life== Lyra is the daughter of former mayor of Caruaru and former governor of Pernambuco João Lyra Neto. She is married to Fernando Lucena, and has two sons: Fernando Jr. and João. ==Political career== Lyra was elected to the state legislative of Pernambuco in the 2010 elections with 49,610 votes. Lyra was reelected in 2014 with around 80,000 votes, being the most voted state representative that election. Lyra was elected mayor of her hometown Caruaru in 2017 with 53.15% of the vote. She is the first ever woman to be mayor of Caruaru. == References == Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:People from Caruaru Category:Brazilian Social Democracy Party politicians Category:Members of the Legislative Assembly of Pernambuco Category:Women mayors of places in Brazil
title: Raquel Lyra
